Which planet is the largest in the solar: Jupiter is the largest planet in the solar system and has a massive size compared to the other planets.
Who discovered the double helix structur: The double helix structure of DNA was discovered by James Watson and Francis Crick.
When did World War II begin and end?: World War II began in the year 1939 and ended in 1945.
What is the capital of France?: The capital city of France is Paris.
Best tourist place to visit?: Paris is widely regarded as one of the best tourist destinations in the world.
Who is the founder of Microsoft?: Bill Gates is the person who founded Microsoft.
What is the chemical symbol for water?: The chemical symbol representing water is H2O.
How many continents are there?: There are a total of seven continents on Earth.
What is the speed of light?: The speed of light is approximately 299,792 kilometers per second in a vacuum.
Who painted the Mona Lisa?: The famous painting Mona Lisa was created by Leonardo da Vinci.
What is the tallest mountain in the worl: Mount Everest holds the record for being the tallest mountain in the world.
What is the largest ocean on Earth?: The Pacific Ocean is considered the largest ocean on Earth.
Which language is spoken in Brazil?: Portuguese is the official and most widely spoken language in Brazil.
What is the freezing point of water?: The freezing point of water is 0 degrees Celsius, which is equal to 32 degrees Fahrenheit.
Who wrote 'Romeo and Juliet'?: The play 'Romeo and Juliet' was written by William Shakespeare.
What is the square root of 144?: The square root of the number 144 is 12.
What gas do plants absorb?: Plants absorb carbon dioxide from the air for the process of photosynthesis.
Which animal is known as the king of the: The lion is famously known as the king of the jungle.
What is the currency of Japan?: The official currency used in Japan is the Yen.
What does DNA stand for?: DNA is an abbreviation that stands for Deoxyribonucleic Acid.
